## Checklist

<!-- Please check all that apply using "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Security

- [ ] I have reviewed the [Security Guidelines](https://github.com/plexica/plexica/blob/main/docs/SECURITY.md)
- [ ] My code does not introduce security vulnerabilities (SQL injection, XSS, etc.)
- [ ] I have used parameterized queries for all database operations
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] I have checked for proper authentication and authorization
- [ ] I have verified multi-tenant isolation if applicable
- [ ] No secrets or credentials are committed

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the relevant documentation (README, guides, API docs)
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions/classes
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

### Performance

- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] Database queries are optimized and use proper indexes
- [ ] No N+1 query problems introduced
